gameCore

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameCore.Character
      • gameCore.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends Character
    A Monster is a subclass of NPC. Monsters will try to move toward the player.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group D, Main author: Karen Madore Group D Members --------------- Karen Madore Trang Pham Darrell Penner

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(java.lang.StringBuffer output)
      Move the Monster and attack player is player is on adjacent tile, otherwise, do a random move --- not tested yet ---
